summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ServicePlyus multi-page website. All features working correctly: Navbar dropdowns (8 services, 14 boiler brands), service pages, pricing page, blog page, language switching (UZ/RU), lead form with Telegram integration, and mobile responsive navbar.
seed_data_creation: Test leads created with TEST_ prefix during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Navbar Services dropdown shows 8 services (diagnostika, tozalash, uch-klapan, turbina, issiqlik-almashgich, bosim-sensori, manostat, shoshilinch). Navbar Boilers dropdown shows 14 brands (airfel, akfa, atlantic, baxi, baymak, ferroli, rulls, kiturami, unit, viessmann, everel, thermona, navien, orbek). Routes tested: /xizmatlar/:slug, /narxlar, /blog, /katyollar/:slug. Language switching works on all pages (UZ/RU). Lead form submits to /api/lead and sends to Telegram. Mobile responsive navbar works correctly.

navbar_services_dropdown.details: All 8 services displayed correctly with proper translations

service_page_navigation.details: Tested /xizmatlar/diagnostika - page loads with hero title, price, duration, CTA buttons

pricing_page.details: All 8 services shown in pricing table with prices and durations

blog_page.details: Blog page loads with 3 articles and category filters

language_switching.details: UZ/RU switching works on homepage, pricing page, and all other pages

lead_form_submission.details: Form submits successfully, shows success toast, Telegram integration working

mobile_responsive_navbar.details: Mobile menu button visible, menu opens with all navigation items

backend_api_tests.details: 16/16 tests passed - root endpoint, lead API, status API, all service types
